"Login to experience our brand new wallet ! instant \n refunds, No OTP"
Moviepass provides identity management services \n across mmultiple websites - Justickets and moviebuff
"Justickets Private Limited 42,\n Dr Ranga Road,Mylapore Chennai 600004,India"

Justickets offer a quick and easy way 
 to book tickets online for current and 
 upcoming movie releases across cities 
 in india. Pick a movie and get tickets at 
 your favourite cinema or choose from 
 many other cinemas in your city
